events.name: Robowars
events.description: RoboWars: The Ultimate Showdown of Battle Bots! Watch as cutting-edge robots clash in a high-tech arena, combining engineering brilliance with thrilling combat. Who will reign supreme in this epic fight for robotic dominance?

events.name: Death Race
events.description: Unleash your inner engineer and dive into the thrilling Death Race at Celesta 2025! This high-octane event challenges your bot's power, agility, and speed as it navigates a maze of intricate obstacles.

events.name: Robo Soccer
events.description: An ultimate showdown of your strategic abilities and knowledge of robotics fused with engineering design where Innovation meets diverse challenges leading to fast-paced and high energy matches.

events.name: Line Follower
events.description: Get ready to unleash your creativity and engineering prowess at the Line Follower Robot Competition! Design and build swift, autonomous robots to navigate a challenging track using advanced sensors and programming.

events.name: Aero Sprint
events.description: Get ready for the ultimate drone showdown! Join us for an electrifying event that will push your piloting skills to the limit!

events.name: Aquarush
events.description: The roar of the current returns. The depths issue their challenge. This year, Celesta at IIT Patna unleashes AQUA RUSH 2025â€”a contest not just of speed, but of sheer engineering genius.

events.name: Micromouse
events.description: Welcome to a challenge where robotics meets precision, are you all exited to jump into the future of automation?

events.name: Build It Up
events.description: Welcome to BUILD IT UP, the tower designing challenge, an exciting civil engineering event conducted at CELESTA, the Annual Techfest of IIT Patna, in collaboration with ACE â€“ Association of Civil Engineers, IIT Patna. This competition provides a platform for budding engineers to translate theoretical knowledge into practical structural design by conceptualizing, designing, and constructing efficient lattice towers. More than a test of strength, Build it up emphasizes material optimization, load transfer, and structural efficiency.

events.name: Aqua Soccer
events.description: Make a splash in the pool! Rally your crew and dive into this adrenaline-fueled aquasoccer showdown. Outscore the competition, engineer the perfect strike, and stay originalâ€”because in this arena, innovation is the ultimate playmaker.

events.name: Depiction
events.description: The event will be an online competition open for everyone in which the participants are required to paint anything on the theme 'Ruins to Radianceâ€™ And submit their entries before the deadline. Any medium can be used by the participants.

events.name: Astrophysics Voyage
events.description: The event is an online event consisting of 2 rounds in which the first round is quiz round that delves into the fascinating realms of Quantum Physics and Astronomy. And the second round is the coding round to utilize their skills for data science projects in astronomy.

events.name: Kepler's Maze
events.description: There will be a maze with locations having names of celestial bodies in our solar system and there will be a puzzle piece at each location.

events.name: Meme Marketing
events.description: Get ready to dive into the world of marketing as the club presents King of Memes a competition. It's not just about creating memes; it's about unlocking the secrets of effective marketing while having a blast.

events.name: Visions of Sovereignty
events.description: This is a theme-based short film-making event, where a total of 10 days will be given after revealing the theme to script, shoot, edit, and submit the final film. A short synopsis of the film must also be submitted by the event deadline. Submission will be taken online. This is an individual/group event.

events.name: Static Rush
events.description: Basically, this event will be of treasure hunt type. At each location we would place a clue with a volunteer and if they solve that clue, they will be proceeded to other locations of the rush with a component of a circuit. At the final stage they should build the circuit with the components given at each stage of the rush.

events.name: Beg Borrow Steal
events.description: So many items to be found, but so little time. Gather your friends or foes and use whatever means possible in order to attain the maximum amount of items in the given time period. Remember, the only rule is that the items should be genuine. The rest is up to you :)

events.name: Youth Parliament
events.description: The event is a simulation of the parliamentary system of the government, and it will follow the standard Youth Parliament format. The delegates will be allotted portfolios of Members of Parliament(MPs). Participants will discuss various topics, propose bills or resolutions, and engage in debates and discussions to develop and pass legislation.

events.name: Mind Benders
events.description: A mental and logical ability test like no other! Test your intellect, solve intricate puzzles, and push your logical reasoning to its limits. Whether you're a seasoned puzzle solver or a curious mind eager to explore, this event is designed to intrigue and inspire.

events.name: Byte Race
events.description: Byte race is an online coding contest held on codeforces. It invloves 6-8 coding questions based on logical thinking, data structures and various algorithms. It's a platform that ignites passion for coding and emphasizes the collective effort essential in the world of competitive programming.

events.name: Quest-ion
events.description: Sci-Biz-Tech quiz.

events.name: Njath
events.description: Celesta presents NJATH, a not so run of the mill Treasure Hunt. Try solving consecutive rounds of mind-numbing questions as you get closer to the treasure. Transformation Complete. Time taken: 321 years.

events.name: Green Forge
events.description: The Green Steel Case Study event. Teams are required to propose technically sound, innovative, and feasible solutions supported by clear assumptions and analysis. Selected teams will get chance to present their solution offline in IIT PATNA.

events.name: AutoCad Session
events.description: A session will be conducted to make students aware of the platform - AutoCad

events.name: Automated Musical Chairs (Robot Rockers)
events.description: Robot Rockers is an autonomous robotics competition based on musical chairs, where robots detect music and light signals to race for illuminated safe zones when the music stopsâ€”one robot is eliminated each round, and the last surviving bot wins.

events.name: CAD BATTLE
events.description: Unleash your design instincts! Join forces with your teammates and battle the clock in this high-octane CAD challenge. Score high, design smart, and stay originalâ€”because authenticity is the ultimate rule.

events.name: TradeQuest - Virtual Stock Trading Challenge
events.description: As part of Celesta, the annual techfest of IIT Patna, the TIC Club presents TradeQuest, a real-time virtual stock trading competition. Participants will trade using virtual money on the StockGro platform while experiencing real market fluctuations.
